generations.inputText:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: QOOLA is a portable air conditioner that can cool or heat your body.

Tone: informative, friendly
generations.text: Looking for relief from the summer heat? QOOLA is the perfect way to cool down! This portable air conditioner can be used to cool or heat your body, making it the perfect way to stay comfortable all summer long.

Write an ad for the following product

Product: QOOLA is a wearable air conditioner that can cool or heat your body.

Tone: informative, friendly
generations.text: Looking for a way to keep cool this summer? Check out QOOLA, the wearable air conditioner! This little device can cool or heat your body, depending on your needs.

generations.text: Looking for a way to stay cool this summer? Check out QOOLA, the wearable air conditioner! This handy little device attaches to your clothing and provides a refreshing blast of cool air, perfect for those hot days.
